description.value:
You force creatures to temporarily forget about the target. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} while within your quantum field, and memories of the target are temporarily erased or rewritten. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures.

The first time an enemy attempts to locate the target (such as by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seeking}) or uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} to recall information about the target, they take 8d8 mental damage with a basic Will save as they suffer painful migraines and mental static while trying to process information about the missing target. On a critical failure the enemy is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d8.

target.value: 1 creature or object in your quantum field
